reviews.review: Fantastic game. Finished co-op 4 times. Sad there isen't a new version of the game. I would love that, Sadly i don't think this dream will come trough. But i highly recomend this game for playing with a friend.

Did you like the first portal game? Of course you did! Portal 2 is another amazing game, well worthy of being the original Portal's sequel. I purchased the game on sale but it is definitely worth the full price if you don't want to wait. If you played the first game, the mechanics will be very familiar but there are some new features that only add to the enjoyment of the game.

Portal 2 is a major improvement from its prevoius installment. With new puzzle mechanics, a 8 hr long campaign and online multiplayer player campaign community mad puzzles and more it proves to be a great game!

This is the most best game I have ever played in my entire life. It is very challenging and you can play with your own friends!

This is a beautiful game full of personality and still loved by many despite it being just over 8 years old (I believe).

I've played this game through several times now and I still find myself stumped with some of the puzzles, each time I play the game it's a fresh experience and I always find myself giggling at the dialogue or staring off at the amazing visuals. If you haven't played this game, why do you even have a steam account, dummy.

Terrific game for all ages, last time I played this game I was 11 so as long as your kid is reasonably tough (as sometimes the turret sounds can be creepy or having to take them out can be stressful/scary). The puzzle are also not too hard but do provide some challenge but enough so that you don't give up easily. Recommended.
(Also for 144fps type "fps_max 144" without the quotation marks in the developer console and keep the space in between 'max' and '144').

This game isn't just a campaign, even though it is very good. You can make your own levels and share them with other people. There is a rating system where people can comment on your levels but you can turn comments off. I recommend this game to everyone.

Portal 2 is art. [i] When you hear the buzzer, stare at the art[/i]. This game has a great story, characters and puzzles to solve. The more the story goes on, the more you discover the characters, but also the history of Aperture Laboratories. And besides the great singleplayer adventure, there is a co-op mode with its own story and puzzles, which guarantees fun with friends. There is also a workshop, that has alot of great puzzles, including both singleplayer and co-op made by the community. This is one of the games that mark Valve's greatness.

[h1] Approvato a pieni voti [/h1]
Ben pi√π valido del primo capitolo grazie a nuove interfacce, suoni, ambientazioni (e simpatia), Portal 2 riprende gli stessi concetti di storia del precedente ma con grafica migliorata,nuovi rompicapi e la funzionalit√† di Coop per giocare in compagnia c:
Ci troviamo nella stessa base di sempre, ma dopo chiss√† quanti anni essa √® caduta in distruzione...con noi dentro.
Lo riterr√≤ sempre uno dei migliori puzzle game di sempre, e decisamente uno dei giochi con la miglior ambientazione!
